table.name: vtiger_mobile_alerts
table.sql: CREATE TABLE `vtiger_mobile_alerts` ( `id` int(11) NOT NULL AUTO_INCREMENT, `handler_path` varchar(500) DEFAULT NULL, `handler_class` varchar(50) DEFAULT NULL, `sequence` int(11) DEFAULT NULL, `deleted` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', PRIMARY KEY (`id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
